meta_description: The Fox News host and a guest somehow conclude that failing to lock up Hunter Biden may contribute to Americans choosing to live under fascism in 10 to 20 years.
meta_title: Tucker Carlson Justifies the Idea of a Full-Blown Fascist Takeover | Vanity Fair

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: It didn't say he justified it, it actually implied that they are *worried* this is going to happen. And I am too, I have lately been seeing conservatives abandon everything they stood for and move towards fascism in reaction to the left. Periods of civil unrest and paranoia can make people feel like an iron fist is the only thing that can save them, and believe me want-to-be dictators will take every advantage of that as they always have in history.
body_html: It didn't say he justified it, it actually implied that they are worried this is going to happen. And I am too, I have lately been seeing conservatives abandon everything they stood for and move towards fascism in reaction to the left. Periods of civil unrest and paranoia can make people feel like an iron fist is the only thing that can save them, and believe me want-to-be dictators will take every advantage of that as they always have in history.
